column2: George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act One (2014) #5
column6: IT'S ZOMBIES VS VAMPIRES-WITH HUMANS CAUGHT IN THE CROSSFIRE- AS THE LEGENDARY GEORGE ROMERO UNLEASHES HIS NEXT UNDEAD EPIC! - Beware NYC's growing zombie evolution-and its new leader...Xavier! - Meanwhile, which strange bedfellows are scheming to take down Mayor Chandrake? - Plus: It's a terrorizing team-up in variant cover form when the Zombie Godfather George Romero unites with the Zombie King Arthur Suydam!
